attributes.additional_details: They can not do biopsies or ct scans not enough funding .
attributes.background: PDSA is amazing charity for Animals who owners can not afford private veterinary bills therefore rely on the PDSA who are struggling to keep up with demand they can only do so much with public donations

rejection.details:
PDSA is a charity. It's policies and fund-raising activities are the responsibility of its Trustees.

We can't accept petitions which call for the Government to fund individual charities, which can apply for government funding and funding from other organisations if they wish.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/get-funding-to-start-a-charity#sources-of-funding

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
